attributes.action: Locate Disneyland UK centrally, away from London - boost other UK regions
attributes.additional_details:
We wish to urge the decision to be reviewed and serious consideration to be made, to locate Disneyland UK, more centrally, thereby offering the following benefits: 
- Greater accessibility for all citizens, from all regions 
- Boosting the economy in other regions of the UK - not just London and the South East 
- Reduced travel congestion, by moving away from the M25.
attributes.background: An announcement has been made in the press, that the UK will be the proud recipients of the world renowned, Disneyland theme park. Current plans indicate the site will be located in the Kent i.e. the South East, just outside of London.
